name: Oracle APEX (Application Express) Page Designer
description:
Dark theme specifically for the Oracle APEX Page Designer. Should not be used for any other APEX pages aside from page designer.
You will need to specify the URL for this theme yourself since the URLs differ in APEX, simply edit the theme and add your URL to it.
additional_info:
Should not be used for any other APEX pages aside from page designer.
You will need to specify the URL for this theme yourself since the URLs differ in APEX, simply edit the theme and add your URL to it.
I have also separated it into categories as best as I could, so you can pretty easily edit the colors to your liking.
I plan on adding CSS for the entire website soon.
Please send any bugs/suggestions/missing styling to Ziegenkonigreality@gmail.com, I'll try to release an update for bugs/missing styles quickly. If you can include a picture along with the missing style/bug that would be ideal.

Instructions for changing URL:
1) Go to stylish menu, click on menu icon at top right, click on Manage All Styles.
2) Click edit on this style
3) Change URL to match yours, make sure you select the correct option in the dropdown as well.
css:
@-moz-document domain(example.com) {

/* Links */
a
{
    color: #ccbaff;
}


/* Secondary Background (Headers, etc.) */
#R386900501419360208,
.a-Toolbar--insetShadow, 
.ui-tabs--simpleInset > .a-Tabs-toolbar > .ui-tabs-nav,
.a-GridLayout-wrapper,
.a-Splitter-barH,
.a-Splitter-barV,
.a-IconList-item.is-selected,
.ui-tabs--subTabButtons > .a-Tabs-toolbar > .ui-tabs-nav .ui-tabs-active,
.a-TreeView-row.is-hover,
.a-IconList-item:hover,
.a-Button.is-active,
.a-Button:hover,
.a-PageSelect,
.a-PropertyEditor-filter,
.a-PropertyEditor-propertyGroup-header,
.a-Property-field,
.a-Property-buttonContainer .a-Button,
.a-Property-radioGroup--yesNo .a-Property-radio-input + label,
.a-CV, .a-CV-colWrap,
table.formlayout td input.text_field,
table.formlayout td input[type="text"],
.a-Form-inputContainer input.text_field:focus, .a-Form-inputContainer input[type="text"]:focus,
.apex-app-builder .a-Breadcrumb-label .a-Icon.icon-breadcrumb-previous,
#pe_5,
#CLEAR_PAGE_SEARCH,
body .ui-dialog .ui-dialog-titlebar,
.ui-dialog-buttonpane,
.a-Header-accountDialog-buttons
{
 	background-color: #333333 !important;  
}

/* Main Text Color */
.a-Header-tabsContainer .a-MenuBar-label, /* Main Menu */
.a-Breadcrumb-label,
a.a-Breadcrumb-label,
.a-Button,
.a-TreeView-content.is-not-important .a-TreeView-label,
.a-TreeView-label,
.a-Tabs--pageDesignerTabs .ui-tabs-anchor .a-Icon,
.ui-tabs--simpleInset > .a-Tabs-toolbar > .ui-tabs-nav .ui-tabs-active .ui-tabs-anchor,
.a-GridLayout-page > .a-GridLayout-regionContainer > h3,
td > .a-GridLayout-regionContainer > h3,
.a-GridLayout-region > h3,
.a-GridLayout-region .a-GridLayout-buttonContainer, 
.a-GridLayout-region .a-GridLayout-itemContainer,
.a-GridLayout-page > h3,
.a-GridLayout-region .a-GridLayout-regionContent,
.a-GridLayout-region .a-GridLayout-regionContainer,
.a-GridLayout-region > h3 .a-Icon,
.a-GridLayout-pageItem .a-Icon,
.a-Gallery-pageItem .a-Icon,
.a-IconList-item,
.a-IconList-item:hover,
.ui-tabs--subTabButtons > .a-Tabs-toolbar > .ui-tabs-nav .ui-tabs-active,
body .ui-state-focus a:link,
body .ui-state-default a, 
body .ui-state-default a:link,
.a-Button.is-active,
.a-Header-tabsContainer .a-MenuBar-item.a-Menu--current .a-MenuBar-label,
.a-MenuBar-item:hover,
.a-PageSelect-input,
.a-Button.a-PageSelect-menuButton,
.a-Button.a-Button--pageNav,
.a-Property-field,
span.icon-search:nth-child(2),
.a-PropertyEditor-propertyGroup-title,
.a-PropertyEditor-propertyGroup-header .a-Icon,
.a-Property-label,
.a-Property-radioGroup--yesNo .a-Property-radio-input:checked + label,
body .ui-widget-content,
.a-CV-component,
.a-CV-groupHeader .a-Button--regionHeader,
table.formlayout td label,
.a-Form-inputContainer .checkbox_group label,
table.formlayout td input.text_field,
table.formlayout td input[type="text"],
.a-Form-inputContainer input.text_field:focus, .a-Form-inputContainer input[type="text"]:focus,
.a-HelpRegion p,
.a-Menu .a-Menu-item,
.apex-app-builder .a-Breadcrumb-label .a-Icon.icon-breadcrumb-previous,
body .ui-dialog .ui-dialog-title,
.a-Property-setItemsHeader-header
{
 	color:  #cccccc !important; 
}

/* Main Background Color */
.a-ControlBar,
body .ui-tabs .ui-tabs-panel,
.a-Toolbar-pageColumn,
.ui-tabs--simpleInset > .a-Tabs-toolbar > .ui-tabs-nav .ui-tabs-active .ui-tabs-anchor,
.a-GridLayout-page > .a-GridLayout-regionContainer,
td > .a-GridLayout-regionContainer,
.a-GridLayout-region,
.a-GridLayout-page > h3,
.a-Splitter-barH:hover, 
.a-Splitter-barV:hover,
.ui-tabs--subTabButtons > .a-Tabs-toolbar,
.a-Header-tabsContainer .a-MenuBar-item.a-Menu--current,
.a-MenuBar-item:hover,
.a-PropertyEditor-propertyGroup,
.a-CV-col,
.a-HelpRegion,
.a-Menu-content,
.a-Header-col--right
{
    background-color: #444444;
    background: #444444 !important;
}

/* Layout Manager Containers */
.a-GridLayout-region,
.a-GridLayout-region > h3,
body .ui-state-default, 
body .ui-widget-content .ui-state-default, 
body .ui-widget-header .ui-state-default,
#button-save-page,
.a-Property-radioGroup--yesNo .a-Property-radio-input:checked + label
{
    background-color: #666666;
    border-bottom: 0px;
    border: 1px solid #666666;
}

/* Layout Manager Selected Container */
.a-GridLayout-region.is-selected > h3,
.a-GridLayout-region.is-selected,
.a-GridLayout-region.is-selected.is-focused,
.a-GridLayout-region.is-selected.is-focused > h3,
.a-GridLayout-page.is-selected > h3,
.a-GridLayout-page.is-selected.is-focused > h3,
.a-Splitter-barH.is-focused,
.a-Splitter-barV.is-focused,
#go_to_page_button,
.a-Property-field:not(.a-Property-field--textarea),
.a-CV-groupHeader,
.a-Splitter-barH .a-Splitter-thumb, 
.a-Splitter-barV .a-Splitter-thumb
{
    background-color: #777777;
    border-color: #666666;
    color: #cccccc;
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 0px;
}

/* Layout Manager dotted lines */
.a-GridLayout-region .a-GridLayout-buttonContainer, 
.a-GridLayout-region .a-GridLayout-itemContainer, 
.a-GridLayout-region .a-GridLayout-regionContainer, 
.a-GridLayout-region .a-GridLayout-regionContent
{
    border: 1px dashed #666666;
}

/* Grid Layout Buttons */
.a-GridLayout-button,
.a-GridLayout-pageItem
{
    background-color: #2d7bbb;
    border: 1px solid #0564b2;
}
}
